data.actual_result: Your screenshare doesn't end, and you automatically start screensharing in the new channel.
data.expected_result: Your screenshare should end when you are moved to a new voice channel.
data.short_description: When you are automatically moved to a new voice channel while screensharing, you continue to screenshare.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a Voice channel, and start screensharing (or, join a voice channel and start screensharing with your alt).- Get moved to a different voice channel (or, move your alt to a different voice channel with your main).- Observe how you automatically screenshare when you are moved to a new channel.
